item.title: Reading Recommendations
item.description: Relationship Anarchy Andie Nordgren - The short instructional manifesto for relationship anarchy Andie Nordgren - The Road to Relationship Anarchy Years after writing the manifesto, Andie revisits the aspects of relationship anarchy he finds to be the most important: creating loving relationships that do not cage people in; resisting shaping relationships through norms of gender or sexuality; acknowledging power dynamics and working to create relationships where people do not constrain one another, but rather come together through their free will.
